title: Becoming Dinner
description: Becoming Dinner by Jenna AlexanderGenre: Fantasy, m/f, Vampire Erotic Romance4 Nymphs from Literary Nymphs Reviews"Set at night, under cover of a dense forest, Becoming Dinner does a fantastic job of setting the scene. The sheer terror our main character experiences just trying to survive the night while attempting to get back home had me on tenterhooks."4 Delightful Divas from Dark Diva Reviews"Ms. Alexander did not waste any words. She filled this story with heart-pounding suspense and terror, as well as erotic and captivating sex."Sometimes escape isn't the answer.Available through Shadowfire Press: http://tinyurl.com/becomingdinner
author: Jenna Alexander
